select m_date,
max( case in_out when 1 then money end ) in_money, max( case in_out when 2 then money end ) out_money
from ( select left(m_date,7) m_date, sum(money) money,in_out from money c where 1=1
and c.m_date like concat ('%', #{mDate},'%')
group by left(m_date,7),in_out ) tp group by m_date order by m_date

select c.*, d.dict_name typeName,d.val1 typeIcon from money c left join dict_info d on c.m_type=d.id
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.remark like concat ('%', #{name},'%')
and c.m_type = #{mType}
and c.m_date like concat ('%', #{mDate},'%')
